description.en: Understanding anger and the processes that occur in a person when he gets angry.
description.et: Agressiivse käitumise käsitlemine ja enda sees toimuvate protsesside märkamine. Rollimängud viha valitsemise meetodite omandamiseks.

objectives.en:
To give knowledge about anger and how to control it. 
Methods of anger management.

learning_outcomes.en:
The student knows about the positive and negative consequences of aggressive behaviour. 
The student can control his thoughts and he can behave properly. 
He can tolerate insults and criticism.

grade_evaluation.et: Aktiivne osalemine õppetöös (80%). Praktilise ülesande sooritamine.
